benefits.heading: Built for session-based futures and forex routines
benefits.subheading: Stay aligned with session timing, avoid event surprises, and keep a consistent process whether you trade from New York time or your local timezone.

features.title: Session Clock (NY Time-first)
features.description: See today's session timing at a glance with real-time countdowns to key transitions. New York time is the default workflow, with timezone switching available anytime.

features.title: Forex Factory-powered economic events
features.description: Keep catalysts in the same view as your session timing. Filter by impact and currency so you only focus on what matters for your pairs and instruments.

features.title: Custom events + reminders
features.description: Add your own checkpoints: prep windows, no-trade zones, funding rule reminders, session opens, and personal routines. Use reminders/notifications where available.

features.title: Settings that stick
features.description: Sign in to sync preferences across devices, or stay in guest mode with local persistence. Either way, your workflow stays consistent day after day.

entries.question: What is Time 2 Trade?
entries.answer: Time 2 Trade is a Session Clock + Economic Calendar (NY Time) for intraday futures and forex traders. It combines session timing, countdowns, and Forex Factory-powered economic events in one fast workspace.

entries.question: Is the economic calendar powered by Forex Factory?
entries.answer: Yes. Time 2 Trade uses a Forex Factory-powered events feed and presents it with modern filtering and session context so you can spot high-impact releases without tab-hopping.

entries.question: Can I create custom events and reminders?
entries.answer: Yes. You can add custom events (prep checkpoints, no-trade windows, session reminders) and use reminders/notifications where available to stay aligned with your routine.

entries.question: Does it adapt to my timezone automatically?
entries.answer: The app detects your local timezone on first load and lets you switch at any time. All session windows, countdowns, and event timestamps update instantly.

entries.question: Are my settings saved?
entries.answer: Yes. When signed in, preferences can sync to the cloud; guests fall back to local storage so your layout, sessions, and filters persist between visits.
